title: Key inflation report looms on Thursday as traders grow more confident in Fed rate cut
content: The June consumer price index will be released Thursday, with traders eyeing September for the Federal Reserve's first rate cut.
summary: The June consumer price index will be released Thursday, with traders eyeing September for the Federal Reserve's first rate cut.

title: China's robotaxi push sparks concerns about job security for drivers
content: China's yearslong effort to develop robotaxis is starting to gain traction with consumers — and rattling taxi drivers who are worried about losing their jobs
summary: China's yearslong effort to develop robotaxis is starting to gain traction with consumers — and rattling taxi drivers who are worried about losing their jobs

title: Samsung to launch upgraded voice assistant Bixby this year with its own AI
content: Samsung will launch an upgraded version of its voice assistant Bixby this year based on its own artificial intelligence models, mobile chief TM Roh told CNBC.
summary: Samsung will launch an upgraded version of its voice assistant Bixby this year based on its own artificial intelligence models, mobile chief TM Roh told CNBC.

title: Bill Gross says Tesla is the new meme stock
content: Longtime investor Bill Gross believes Elon Musk's Tesla is behaving like a speculative play among retail investors.
summary: Longtime investor Bill Gross believes Elon Musk's Tesla is behaving like a speculative play among retail investors.

title: UK launches new rules for listings in bid to boost growth for London's stock exchange
content: The U.K.’s Financial Conduct Authority has announced new rules for stock market listings in the country which aim to “boost growth and innovation.”
summary: The U.K.’s Financial Conduct Authority has announced new rules for stock market listings in the country which aim to “boost growth and innovation.”

title: Shares of Stellar Blade maker Shift Up surge almost 50% on trading debut
content: The company sold 7.25 million shares in its IPO, raising 435 billion won or about $315.56 million.
summary: The company sold 7.25 million shares in its IPO, raising 435 billion won or about $315.56 million.

title: Japanese warship entered China's waters near Taiwan despite warnings, domestic media reports
content: A Japanese navy destroyer entered Chinese territorial waters recently in spite of repeated warnings, local news reported.
summary: A Japanese navy destroyer entered Chinese territorial waters recently in spite of repeated warnings, local news reported.

title: An investment banker quit her job to become a YouTuber and now makes over $1 million
content: An investment banker who quit her job to become a YouTuber — just two months before a six-figure bonus — now has over 1 million subscribers.
summary: An investment banker who quit her job to become a YouTuber — just two months before a six-figure bonus — now has over 1 million subscribers.

title: Samsung launches latest foldable phones in the face of rising competition and Apple's AI play
content: Samsung took the wraps off the Galaxy Z Fold6 and Z Flip6, which come with improvements from previous models and AI features from translation to photo editing.
summary: Samsung took the wraps off the Galaxy Z Fold6 and Z Flip6, which come with improvements from previous models and AI features from translation to photo editing.

title: Man caught attempting to smuggle 104 live snakes in his pants at China border
content: A man attempting to smuggle 104 live snakes in his pants was caught at a Chinese border this week, according to the country's customs authority.

title: Japan's Nikkei smashes past 42,000 mark to all-time highs as Asia markets rally on rate cut optimism
content: In Asia, investors will be watching for any spillover optimism in the region's tech stocks, particularly in Japan.

title: CNBC Daily Open: A true bull market — it's not Wall Street
content: S&P 500 closes above 5,600 for the first time. Archegos founder convicted of market manipulation. Tesla is a "meme stock."

title: Musk says next Neuralink brain implant expected soon, despite issues with the first patient
content: Neuralink is gearing up to implant its second human patient, despite hardware challenges with the first patient.

title: As NATO meets, leaders look to 'Trump-proof' the military alliance
content: As NATO meets in Washington, the alliance is facing familiar foes and challenges. The prospect of another Donald Trump presidency is one of them.

title: HubSpot shares plunge 12% on report that Alphabet is shelving interest in acquiring software company
content: Alphabet has reportedly shelved its interest in acquiring HubSpot months after the companies were in talks.

title: China is leading on GenAI experimentation, but lags U.S. in implementation, survey shows
content: Chinese companies lead the world in general generative AI use but are still behind the U.S. in full implementation, a new survey finds.
summary: Chinese companies lead the world in general generative AI use but are still behind the U.S. in full implementation, a new survey finds.

title: 'Don't get tired': Samsung Electronics workers extend strike indefinitely, say chip production disrupted
content: This is the first strike by the labor union in Samsung Electronics' entire 55-year history, according to local media.
summary: This is the first strike by the labor union in Samsung Electronics' entire 55-year history, according to local media.

title: NASA still expects Boeing's Starliner to return astronauts from ISS, but notes SpaceX backup option
content: Officials say Starliner capsule "Calypso" may return as soon as the end of this month from its extended ISS stay.

title: Barcelona protesters throw items and spray travelers with water while shouting ‘tourists go home’
content: The protesters — angry about the city's long-standing problems with overtourism — also used tape to block hotel entrances and sidewalk cafes in Barceloneta.

title: Greece defends new six-day working week legislation, says it's an 'exceptional measure'
